statements: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT date, description FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT description, amount FROM transactions WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE description LIKE '%electronic%';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT description, amount FROM transactions WHERE date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT transaction_id, description, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount < 500 AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE description LIKE '%payment%' OR description LIKE '%invoice%'
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions
SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM budgets ORDER BY budget_amount DESC
SELECT budget_category FROM budgets WHERE budget_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-28';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT budget_category, SUM(budget_amount) AS total_budget FROM budgets GROUP BY budget_category;
SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN budgets ON transactions.amount <= budgets.budget_amount;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date = '2021-03-15' AND amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM budgets WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, category FROM budgets WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY user_id, category;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING SUM(amount) > 500

SELECT u.username, b.category, t.amount FROM users u JOIN budgets b ON u.user_id = b.user_id JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT t.transaction_id, u.username, t.amount FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE t.amount = (SELECT MAX(amount) FROM transactions)
SELECT * FROM budgets ORDER BY amount ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, category FROM transactions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT description, amount FROM transactions WHERE category='Food' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT account_name, account_type, balance FROM accounts WHERE account_type='Savings';
SELECT transaction_id, date, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT * FROM budgets WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-06-30';
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings' ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT t.*, tc.category_name FROM transactions t JOIN transactions_categories tc ON t.category = tc.category_id WHERE tc.parent_category_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'S%'
SELECT budget_name, total_amount FROM budgets WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT transaction_id, amount, description FROM transactions WHERE category = 'Groceries' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT * FROM categories WHERE category_name LIKE '%food%'
SELECT user_id, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id ASC
